extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StructuralMotif.Type
      The type of a StructuralMotif, representing inter (across multiple protein chains) and intra (within one protein chain) StructuralMotifs.

      • fromLeafIdentifiers

        public static StructuralMotif fromLeafIdentifiers(Structure structure,
                                                  java.util.List<LeafIdentifier> leafIdentifiers)
        Creates a StructuralMotif by extracting the given residues identified by a list of LeafIdentifiers.
        Parameters:
        structure - The Structure from which the StructuralMotif should be extracted.
        leafIdentifiers - The LeafIdentifiers of the residues that should compose the StructuralMotif.
        Returns:
        A new StructuralMotif.

      • addExchangeableFamily

        public void addExchangeableFamily(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier,
                                  MatcherFamily matcherFamily)
        For a given LeafIdentifier a possible exchange is added. This exchange is considered when searching with Fit3D. The MatcherFamily allows exchanges for groups of LeafSubstructures with similar physicochemical attributes.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The leaf to add the exchange to.
        matcherFamily - The MatcherFamily.

      • addExchangeableFamily

        public void addExchangeableFamily(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier,
                                  NucleotideFamily nucleotideFamily)
        For a given LeafIdentifier a possible exchange is added. This exchange is considered when searching with Fit3D.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The leaf to add the exchange to.
        nucleotideFamily - The Nucleotide that can be exchanged.

      • addExchangeableFamily

        public void addExchangeableFamily(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier,
                                  AminoAcidFamily aminoAcidFamily)
        For a given LeafIdentifier a possible exchange is added. This exchange is considered when searching with Fit3D.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The leaf to add the exchange to.
        aminoAcidFamily - The AminoAcid that can be exchanged.

      • addExchangeableFamilyToAll

        public void addExchangeableFamilyToAll(AminoAcidFamily aminoAcidFamily)
        Assigns an AminoAcidFamily to all members of this motif as exchange.
        Parameters:
        aminoAcidFamily - The AminoAcidFamily which should be assigned as exchangeable type.

      • addExchangeableFamilyToAll

        public void addExchangeableFamilyToAll(NucleotideFamily nucleotideFamily)
        Assigns an NucleotideFamily to all members of this motif as exchange.
        Parameters:
        nucleotideFamily - The NucleotideFamily which should be assigned as exchangeable type.

      • addExchangeableFamilyToAll

        public void addExchangeableFamilyToAll(MatcherFamily matcherFamily)
        Assigns each member of a MatcherFamily to all members of this motif as exchange.
        Parameters:
        matcherFamily - The MatcherFamily that bundles all members which should be assigned as exchangeable type.
